item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my online space. I use this space to post about a few things that I do in my spare time that I think could be useful to some random netizen. I’m not great at writing so I like to keep things short and sweet. I love all things operating systems and programming languages. My pronouns are he/him/his. My operating systems of choices are centos, debian, fedora, freebsd and openbsd, not in any specific order but whenever it is the right tool for the job. The programming languages that I most use are python, ruby and go.
